title: A chatbot entirely powered by humans, not artificial intelligence? This Chilean community shows why
description: About 50 members of a community outside Chile’s capital spent Saturday trying their best to power an entirely human-operated chatbot that could answer questions and make silly pictures on command, in a message to highlight the environmental toll and water usage of artificial intelligence data centers in the region

title: Homebuyers in Spain warned about misleading AI-enhanced listings

title: For the first time in 50 years, college grads are losing their edge
description: For years, a bachelor’s degree or higher has led to better job prospects. But artificial intelligence is changing the playing field.
content: With more students pursuing occupational and technical degrees in fields with labor shortages such as construction, manufacturing and health care, enrollment at community colleges rose 3 percent in the fall compared with the year before, according to... [8467 chars]

title: Grammys’ AI rules aim to keep music human, but large gray area leaves questions about authenticity and authorship
description: At its best, artificial intelligence can assist people in analyzing data, automating tasks and developing solutions to big problems: fighting cancer, hunger, poverty and climate change. At its worst, AI can assist people in exploiting other humans, damaging the environment, taking away jobs and eventually making ourselves lazy and less…
